docs.text:
Canary.jl


An exploration of discontinuous Galerkin methods in Julia.




Installation


To install, run the following commands in the Julia REPL:


] add 
https://github.com/climate-machine/Canary.jl





and then run


using Canary




to load the package.


If you are using some of the MPI based functions at the REPL you will also need to load MPI with something like


using MPI
MPI.Init()
MPI.finalize_atexit()




If you have problems building MPI.jl try explicitly providing the MPI compiler wrappers through the 
CC
 and 
FC
 environment variables.  Something like the following at your Bourne shell prompt:


export CC=mpicc
export FC=mpif90




Then launch Julia rebuild MPI.jl with


] build MPI






Building Documentation


You may build the documentation locally by running



julia --color=yes --project=docs/ -e 'using Pkg; Pkg.instantiate()'

julia --color=yes --project=docs/ docs/make.jl





where first invocation of 
julia
 only needs to be run the first time.

export FC=mpif90  Then launch Julia rebuild MPI.jl with  ] build MPI
